reviews.review:
Half Life is a first-person shooter that mixes great narrative and gameplay. You play as Gordon Freeman, a gun wielding theoretical physicist. After an incident at Black Mesa Research Facility it is your mission to save the world.

As the role of Freeman, brute force is not always the solution, and the game features some challenging puzzles and boss fights. Half life is known to be a milestone in its genre, and rightfully so. It is never too late to pick this game up and smash some headcrabs to death with your iconic crowbar.

Думаю нет таких людей, которые не знают, что это за эпическая игра) 
Начало великих начал.
Благодаря этой игре есть Counter-Strike, Team Fortress, Steam, а Гейб это Гейб )))
С этого и началась серия Half-Life, так любимая многими (мной в том числе)
Истинный ценитель должен это пройти.
Amazing beginning for a great saga!

Todo un hito para la industria del videojuego. Reinventó el género. El juego goza de un ralismo impresionante, y una inteligencia artificial superior a la de muchos juegos actuales. Tiene un sinfín de detalles que hacen de este juego una obra maestra. Siempre guardaré la sensación que me produjo el ambiente claustrofóbico de Black Mesa la primera vez que lo jugué. Todo un clásico que todo el mundo debería haber jugado.
Einfach nur ein "Must Have"

Es un muy buen juego, la historia no es la gran cosa sin embargo lo entretenido de este fichin es su jugabilidad: cada nivel esta lleno de enemigos o puzzles que tenemos que resolver tratando de no perder mucha vida o energia del traje de proteccion. La vida es algo importante porque segun la cantidad que tengamos nos cambia la dificultad del juego (no es lo mismo tener la vida llena y entrar en un cuarto lleno de enemigos que si tuvieramos 1 de vida). La IA de los enemigos funciona bastante bien (en el caso de los aliens es bastante buena: si un alien te ve y vos te escondes el alien te encuentra en dos segundos, en el caso de los soldados tambien: apenas te asomas por un pasillo en donde hay uno solo y ya te empieza a disparar). Lo unico que me queda por decir es: ANDA A COMPRARLO PELOTUDO.
EEEEEEEEHHH ITS OKAY!!
你还记得当年大明湖畔的夏雨荷吗！？
Anyone who considers themselves a "PC Gamer" MUST play this game! Definately an "oldie but a goodie!" So stop reading and spam the purchase button!!!
One of the greatest shooters of all time.

If you like first-person shooters and you like plot-driven games, you should just stop reading this and buy Half-Life.  I can't say anything else that its FIFTY game of the year awards and the fact that it's 15 years later and the industry is still gaga over it hasn't already said.

THE ANIME HALF-LIFE FEATURES KAWAII GIRLS DOING KAWAII THINGS, HOWEVER THIS GAME DOES NOT. PPS THE BLACK MESSA ANIME SUCKS. INSTEAD OF BEING FREEDOM FIGHTERS THREE, THIS GAME WAS MADE INSTEAD, WITH SOME NEAT IDEAS IN THE MULTIPLAYER INSTEAD OF CAMPAIGN, THE LOGO OF THIS GAME DOES EVEN USE THE KANJI FOR SHIT! COULDNT EVEN TELL IT WAS FROM JAPAN! 2 STARS OUTA 10!
This was the beginning for me. The reason why I use Steam. All hail Gordon Freeman!
Einer der besten und einzigartigsten Shooter aller Zeiten die Grafik ist zwar älter, aber das Gameplay und die Story sind top.

Ambientazione immensa che incentiva all'esplorazione; Nemici curiosi e letali; Set di armi vario e accattivante, dal classico e devastante fucile a pompa alla pistola futuristica che spara raggi laser; Meccaniche di gioco semplici e una grafica che farà di certo gola ai nostalgici dei videogames un po'retrò. Se non bastasse, a suo tempo il gioco ha rivecuto ben 50 "Game of the Year" Awards ed è stato nominato "Best PC Game Ever" da Pc Gamer per ben tre anni. Di certo un prodotto consigliato per coloro che vogliono rivivere le vecchie proposte FPS, tra l'altro spesso oggetto di apprezzatissimi sconti sulla piattaforma Steam ;)

I can't believe it took me until 2013 to play this game.

Overall, it's a great Sci-Fi FPS with a bit of age in regards to enemy AI and slippery platforming, but a good time, nonetheless.

Jak na rok 1998 gra naprawdę genialna. Gra stawia poprzeczkę bardzo wysoko jeśli chodzi o poziom trudności (przynajmniej w moim wypadku). Najbardziej życie utrudnili mi żołnierze mający na celu zabezpieczyć ośrodek. Niezłe z nich skurwiele (czyt. świetne AI). Jeśli kogoś zraża grafika to polecam Half-Life: Sorce. Ja sam grę skończyłem właśnie na tej wersji. 
 
Audio/Video: Trudno ocenić 
Grywalność: 10
Ocena ogólna: 10

PS. Podziękowania dla Zbrojnego za zmuszanie mnie do kupienia tej gry ;_;

Half-Life is quite possibly one of the most important first-person shooters ever created. You're not a space marine: you're a scientist fighting for your life. You truly feel alone when your only companion--be it a scientist or one of the many security guards trapped with you--bites the dust, leaving you to fend for yourself. Seamlessly flowing from cinematics to action, there are no cutscenes: the control is never taken from you. Your journey through Black Mesa begins.

The game that started it all for pc gaming. Great classic end still fun to play today.

8/10
The game that started one of the most well-known series in the gaming industry. Those who love first person shooters packed with action and compelling stories would enjoy this game.

There's a good reason why Half-Life is as popular as it is, and it's a simple reason too: It's a great fucking game. If you're reading this and contemplating whether or not to buy the game, then you're late to the party like I was. The graphics are outdated and the controls are as liquid and swift as those expected from games born from the Doom influence. There's ways around bad graphics, such as the Black Mesa mod that recreates the original Half-Life with the newer Source engine. However, this is the fullest and most complete version of the game, and the ambiance of the original is yet outmatched. 

Play this game for the experience alone, just so that you are knowledgable about a piece of gaming history. You won't regret it.

Notice: Use the game's console to change the Field of View (FOV) to 90. Some players (including myself) said they experience mild nausea at the current settings. (You can Google how to do this if it becomes an issue for you).

Jedna z najlepszych najstarszych gier. Kampania i ten klimat .. choć przydałoby się spolszczenie, ale nie ma nawet napisów po angielsku, wolałbym też trochę więcej broni palnych, bo z palnych są tylko: Glock-17, Magnum, MP5, Spas-12, i M16. No i mogłyby być lepsze animacje, bo czasem postacie w miejscu chodzą, lecz to są drobnostki. Gra się w nią fajnie, aż do dziś, więc należy się Half-Life'owi 10/10.

it is called a classic for a reason.... i was amazed of how well they managed to make the aliens and other things seem realistic, way above the expected from the year it was made. it has a fun and challenging gameplay, and a thrilling story - it might not be much detailed, but the somewhat creepy mood is well-set.

Настоящая легенда, классика игровой индустрии! Плевать на возраст и графику, эта игра прекрасна не смотря не на что. Её атмосфера затягивает и не отпускает. Сегодняшнему игроку может показаться, что игра слишком устарела - ничуть. Half-Life куда лучше многих новомодных игр. Как минимум ознаккомиться с ней долг каждого уважающего себя геймера, поэтому качать и играть даже не раздумывая!

Я хочу предложить вам кое-что, о чем вы не пожалеете.

Если вы заинтересовались - просто купите игру, это даст мне считать ваш ответ положительным. 
В противном случае… Что ж… Я могу предложить вам битву, в которой у вас не будет шансов на победу. 
Это довольно разочаровывающая перспектива после всего того, что вам пришлось и придётся пережить.

The hit that started it all. This classic was revolutionary for it's time, yet it still stands in the list as one of my favorite games of all time. When Gabe Newall gave Chuck Norris a crowbar, he unknowingly created the most beloved and badass game character of all time: Gordon Freeman. I mean, he takes out an entire military coverup and obliterates an alien horde!
Aquí comenzó todo, el orígen de una de las mejores sagas de videojuegos jamás creada. Si no lo tienes o no lo has jugado aún no mereces vivir.

C'è un motivo se questo gioco (ma la parola giusta sarebbe opera d'arte) è ritenuto uno dei migliori FPS che, oltre ad aver rivoluzionato il suo genere, si è pure distinto come tra i migliori esponenti del suo media. 
L'immedesimazione nel protagonista è totale: per tutta la durata della vostra partita la telecamera non si allontanerà mai per farvi vedere il personaggio. Il personaggio siete VOI, e per sopravvivere dovrete sempre ragionare sulla prossima mossa, studiare il territorio in cui vi muoverete ed eliminare i nemici nel modo più rapido possibile, prima che siano loro a farlo. Il level design non è mai scontato, gli effetti di luce e ombra, la fisica, sono ancora oggi grandi prove tecniche. Il design dei mostri che affronterete è spaventoso e la storia è semplicemente travolgente. Se amate il videogioco, non potete non provare Half-Life.

Acabo de terminarlo, me ha llevado unas 22 horas. 22 horazas de sufrimiento sin igual en cuanto a juegos, 22 horas de pelearme con la cámara, con el movimiento, con las armas, con la vida, con los enemigos, con los SALTOS, con mi familia, CON TODO. De avanzar sin tener ni puta idea de qué cojones estaba haciendo, de gritar mucho y cagarme en TODO aproximadamente cada 5 minutos. 

Deleznable, en Valve quedaron muchos huevos descansados después de parir semejante ponzoña; el HL2 debe de ser el mejor juego de la historia para que la peña quiera el 3 como putos yonkis. No lo recomiendo, no se lo regalaría ni a mi ex, es una de las mayores castañas que he jugado en toda mi vida.

Графон - говно. Скрипты, скрипты просто эвривэр, мало того, они настолько забагованы, что в 8 из 10 случаях модельки совершают действия находясь наполовину в потолке/поле. Минут 10 едешь  в гребанном поезеде, ничерта не понятно, какая-то хрень, взрывы, коллайдеры, мертвые ученые. Оружие получаешь только спустя 20 минут, никаих посдскзок, ничего. Игра от вентелей И НЕТ ДАЖЕ ГРЕБАННЫХ ОЧИВОК, ПОНИМАЕТЕ?! Я уже говорил что графин - говно? Никакого реализма, никакой физики. Не понимаю как ЭТО получило 9/10 по метаскору. Мое личное мнение - 2.5 Не больше

Half-Life is one of the best 90’s shooters with an amazing campaign with numerous unique locations to explore throughout an entire government complex, numerous aliens and soldiers, all kinds of weapons at your disposal, alien planets to explore, a god tier soundtrack, etc. Even with how old this game is, it's still amazing and has so many little details to it that make it even better than a lot of games that came out years after it. I would say it’s sinful to not have any Half-Life game in your Steam library. 

+Awesome and fun campaign
+Numerous aliens and soldiers to fight against
+Every chapter takes you to a new and unique location without it being the same sort of level again and again. Lots of platforming and puzzles to have to figure out in order to progress.
+Tons of weapons to use
+Can save where ever and also frequent auto saves
+A nice tutorial
+Not heavy in dialogue and cutscenes allowing more gameplay which is always nice. Occasionally scientists will explain the situation more so instead of just running around killing tons of aliens
+Scientists can heal you and you can command security guards to follow and assist you
+Lots of little details that make the game so amazing. Every character reacts in unique ways, aliens will respond to smell and noises, roaches will go towards meat, aliens will attack differently depending on their surroundings, etc. Aka just a little of extra things that most games don’t even attempt to add or do.
+Kinda short about 3-4 hours
+Xen
+Definitely creepy and mysterious at times
+God tier soundtrack
+Multiplayer… ig
+Cheats
+Breakable crates full of items everywhere
+Multiple endings
+Room full of Gaben’s face

-The way Gordon throws explosives is so annoying so many times he’ll just drop on the ground right in front of him and seems to never throw it. Yet on rare occasions he seems to turn into Tom Brady and launch the explosives. Mainly he barely throws it from himself.
-The game does have multiplayer however, as you can obviously guess for a 23 year old game it’s dead and nobody is playing. There’s still several servers running for what reason idk and a few have bots but they’re usually brain dead and never try to kill you or aimbot that absolute shit out of you. Besides that if you actually find a server with people in it. It’s usually only one server with less than 3 people in it and the only ones playing are some weird no life cucks who have been playing this game for years and will destroy you. To put it simply, the multiplayer is pointless to attempt to play whatsoever.
-Wished that the game gave more of an insight on how to use the long jump when you acquire it as it doesn’t seem to tell you whatsoever how to use it. Even going into the tutorial and seeing how to properly use it I could only get it to work every other jump. Just annoying on how it didn’t tell you how to use it initially and then was problematic to get to work sometimes
-Maybe it was just because I was playing on hard but, I wish there was slightly more autosaves as after clearing 3 rooms of about 15 enemies and then dying and being reset before any of that is really annoying. I guess I just have to save really often.
-From what I remember several grates that are unable to be broken have the same texture as breakable ones
-Game has remote play although I really doubt it works whatsoever. I've never seen Half-Life in split screen and honestly don’t think there is any iteration of it let alone a server that will somehow allow 2 people to play on the same client I don’t see working.
-Issues with reloading at sometimes the gun with freeze and you cannot reload for a couple seconds or the reload animation doesn’t appear
-Trying to kill headcrabs with the shotgun seems to never work

Half-Life is without a doubt a classic FPS shooter that just shows how amazing Valve is that this was one of their first games with so many small details it has in it like a GTA game. The game is just a really entertaining campaign with all kinds of weapons, enemies, and cool locations. The soundtrack is awesome but I wish it had played more often. Honestly nothing really wrong with this game it all besides is dead multiplayer but what do you expect it came out over 20 years ago. Some odd few are still playing it idk why…. Anyways if you are contemplating buying this and don’t like older games like this one then get the Black Mesa remake as you’ll probably enjoy that more so.
its a decent game of its time. though the glitches are really annoying and wont let me finish the game, security guard wont follow me at chapter 12.
Great game.
It's a classic that no one should go without playing.
